name: Slippery Slime (comicnight)
description:
Made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam!

Play as a very slippery little slime as you navigate through courses and collect slime bits along the way to increase your speed. Try not to fall off! Can you make it the end in one piece? Or will you break apart in clumps of slime?

CONTROLS:

Move: WASD or Arrow keys

Jump: Space or 'z'

WARNING: SUPER UNPOLISHED GAME JAM GAME AHEAD!
